text: It looks like the plastic straw may be going the way of the fax machine and fountain pen : Starbucks, the world â€™ s biggest coffee seller, announced plans to nix straws at all of its stores by 2020. The chain, with more than 28, 000 locations, is officially the largest food company in the world to make this promise, and has the power and influence to spur other restaurants of all sizes to follow in its footsteps. Starbucks estimates that this move will eliminate the use of 1 billion plastic straws per year. Starbucks says it will replace plastic straws with paper or compostable plastic straws for blended drinks like Frappuccinos.
